descriptionHtml:
Living Blade of Woe
_________________________________________________________________________________________
Updates
-Added 3d affect to veins
-Added red glare to bottuom of blade
-Added secret bank code inside of blade to the Federal Reserve Bank. Access to all the U.S. money. . . jk
________________________________________________________________________________________
Description
~Adds bloody veins to base of blade
~Creates a higher feel of immersion to the weapon
~Gives blade a scary gore feeling
~In all, just looks more bad ass
Great for anyone who is a sneaky type, being this is the highest base damage value dagger in the game. Many people who like to sneak around use it.
_________________________________________________________________________________________
Installation 
-Auto
1. Download with manager
2. Done,play the game
-Manual (if for some reason you don\'t want to use the manager)
1. Open LivingBladeOfWoe.rar
2. Open you\'re skyrim directory
3. Move data from the .rar to you directory
4. Launch the game
_________________________________________________________________________________________
Credits
Blizzard150.
please endorse if you don\'t ill probably do nothing, :/

Any questions, complaints, ideas, or dirty jokes pm me. I do nothing, go nowhere, and will stay the same for a good amount of time, so i\'ll respond quick enough.
author: blizzard150
